web-scraping_practice-questions_key3: Briefly describe the differences between the webbrowser, requests, BeautifulSoup, and selenium modules.
web-scraping_practice-questions_key5: What type of object is returned by requests.get()? How can you access the downloaded content as a string value?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key7: What Requests method checks that the download worked?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key9: How can you get the HTTP status code of a Requests response?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key11: How do you save a Requests response to a file?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key13: What is the keyboard shortcut for opening a browser’s developer tools?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key15: How can you view (in the developer tools) the HTML of a specific element on a web page?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key17: What is the CSS selector string that would find the element with an id attribute of main?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key19: What is the CSS selector string that would find the elements with a CSS class of highlight?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key21: What is the CSS selector string that would find all the <div> elements inside another <div> element?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key23: What is the CSS selector string that would find the <button> element with a value attribute set to favorite?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key25:
Say you have a Beautiful Soup Tag object stored in the variable spam for the element
Hello world!
. How could you get a string 'Hello world!' from the Tag object?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key27: How would you store all the attributes of a Beautiful Soup Tag object in a variable named linkElem?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key29: Running import selenium doesn’t work. How do you properly import the selenium module?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key31: What’s the difference between the findelement* and findelements* methods?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key33: What methods do Selenium’s WebElement objects have for simulating mouse clicks and keyboard keys?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key35: You could call send_keys(Keys.ENTER) on the Submit button’s WebElement object, but what is an easier way to submit a form with Selenium?
web-scraping_practice-questions_key37: How can you simulate clicking a browser’s Forward, Back, and Refresh buttons with Selenium?
